merge_operations.reason: Both clusters discuss the same project (rebranding) and have overlapping timelines and deliverables. Merging for better organization.

ai_operations.reasoning: The clusters were split based on project phases (planning, execution, approval) and distinct sub-topics within each project. The goal was to create more granular clusters, resulting in a total of 15 clusters. The merge operation was applied to clusters 002 and 003 due to their strong overlap in project and timeline.
